testsuite.name: users.UsersAddressFieldTest
testsuite.system-out: Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersAddressPlaceholderText Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Address field Placeholder text in the Users Add screen" Address* text is displayed in the Address placeholder TC_usersAddressPlaceholderText Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersAddressSpecialChar Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Address field for the Special characters" Performed click action on Users screen Address field Entered text "/%.>," in the Users screen Address field Special characters are allowed in the Address text field TC_usersAddressSpecialChar Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersAddressEmpty Testcase execution Started "This method verifies error message for the empty Address in the Users Add screen" Performed click action on Users screen Address field Entered text "" in the Users screen Address field Required error message is displayed TC_usersAddressEmpty Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersAddressSpace Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Address field by entering Spaces" Entered space in the Users screen Address text field Space is not allowed error message is displayed TC_usersAddressSpace Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersAddressMaximumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Address field for the maximum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Address field Entered text "" in the Users screen Address field Must not exceed 500 characters error message is displayed TC_usersAddressMaximumLength Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersAddressAlphanumeric Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Address field for the Alphabetic characters" Performed click action on Users screen Address field Entered text "ScRPD" in the Users screen Address field Alphanumeric characters are allowed in the Address text field TC_usersAddressAlphanumeric Testcase execution Completed

Browser: chrome Language: english Login Role: super admin TC_usersAddressMinimumLength Testcase execution Started "This method verifies Users Add screen Address field for the minimum character length" Performed click action on Users screen Address field Entered text "gZV" in the Users screen Address field Must be greater than 3 characters error message is displayed TC_usersAddressMinimumLength Testcase execution Completed
